verses.plain: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

tokens.t: And the
spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.plain: Speak unto the children of Israel, and take of every one of them a rod according to the house of their fathers, of all their princes according to the house of their fathers twelve rods: write thou every man’s name upon his rod.

tokens.t: Speak unto the children of Israel, and take of every one of them a rod according to the house of
fathers, of all their princes according to the house of their fathers twelve rods: write thou every man’s name upon his rod.

verses.plain: And thou shalt write Aaron’s name upon the rod of Levi: for one rod shall be for the head of the house of their fathers.

tokens.t: And thou shalt write Aaron’s name upon the rod of Levi: for one rod
for the head of the house of their fathers.

verses.plain: And thou shalt lay them up in the tabernacle of the congregation before the testimony, where I will meet with you.

tokens.t: And thou shalt lay them up in the tabernacle of the congregation before the testimony, where I will meet with you.

verses.plain: And it shall come to pass, that the man’s rod, whom I shall choose, shall blossom: and I will make to cease from me the murmurings of the children of Israel, whereby they murmur against you.

tokens.t: And it shall come to pass,
the man’s rod, whom I shall choose, shall blossom: and I will make to cease from me the murmurings of the children of Israel, whereby they murmur against you.

verses.plain: ¶ And Moses spake unto the children of Israel, and every one of their princes gave him a rod apiece, for each prince one, according to their fathers’ houses, even twelve rods: and the rod of Aaron was among their rods.

tokens.t: ¶ And Moses spake unto the children of Israel, and every one of their princes gave him a rod apiece, for each prince one, according to their fathers’ houses,
twelve rods: and the rod of Aaron
among their rods.

verses.plain: And Moses laid up the rods before the LORD in the tabernacle of witness.

tokens.t: And Moses laid up the rods before the
in the tabernacle of witness.

verses.plain: And it came to pass, that on the morrow Moses went into the tabernacle of witness; and, behold, the rod of Aaron for the house of Levi was budded, and brought forth buds, and bloomed blossoms, and yielded almonds.

tokens.t: And it came to pass, that on the morrow Moses went into the tabernacle of witness; and, behold, the rod of Aaron for the house of Levi was budded, and brought forth buds, and bloomed blossoms, and yielded almonds.

verses.plain: And Moses brought out all the rods from before the LORD unto all the children of Israel: and they looked, and took every man his rod.

tokens.t: And Moses brought out all the rods from before the
unto all the children of Israel: and they looked, and took every man his rod.

verses.plain: ¶ And the LORD said unto Moses, Bring Aaron’s rod again before the testimony, to be kept for a token against the rebels; and thou shalt quite take away their murmurings from me, that they die not.

tokens.t: ¶ And the
said unto Moses, Bring Aaron’s rod again before the testimony, to be kept for a token against the rebels; and thou shalt quite take away their murmurings from me, that they die not.

verses.plain: And Moses did so: as the LORD commanded him, so did he.

tokens.t: And Moses did
as the
commanded him, so did he.

verses.plain: And the children of Israel spake unto Moses, saying, Behold, we die, we perish, we all perish.

tokens.t: And the children of Israel spake unto Moses, saying, Behold, we die, we perish, we all perish.

verses.plain: Whosoever cometh any thing near unto the tabernacle of the LORD shall die: shall we be consumed with dying?

tokens.t: Whosoever cometh any thing near unto the tabernacle of the
shall die: shall we be consumed with dying?

footnotes.text: a rod…: Heb. a rod for one prince, a rod for one prince
